casebody.data:
Russell J. BOYLE, Appellant, v. Tighe E. WOODS, Housing Expediter, Appellee. No. 10760. United States Court of Appeals Sixth Circuit. Feb. 7, 1949. Paul O. Strawhecker, of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellant. Benjamin I. Shulman, of Washington, D. C. (Ed Dupree and Hugo V. Prucha, Washington, D. C., on the brief), for ap-pellee.

Before SIMONS, McALLISTER, and MILLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This action having been heard by the Court on the record, briefs, and oral arguments of respective counsel; it is ordered that the judgment of the District Court be and is affirmed for the reasons given in the opinion of the District Judge, 77 F.Supp. 881.
